department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply, equipment, labour, and, transportation for repair or replacement of asphalt at 14 Wing Greenwood
description: The notice pertains to the procurement of the supply, equipment, labour, and, transportation necessary for the repair or replacement of asphalt at 14 Wing Greenwood. It is for a one-year period. Contractors are required to submit their questions in writing to the Contracting Authority five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.
full_summary: **Tender Information** [**English**](#english) | [**Français**](#français) ### 1. Invitation to Bid **Project Title**: Asphalt Maintenance at 14 Wing Greenwood **Reference Number**: WS3962608255-Doc3962815377 **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) **Closing Date**: 2023-05-10T14:00:00 ### 2. Service Offered The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to submit a tender for the supply, equipment, labour, and transportation required for the repair or replacement of asphalt at 14 Wing Greenwood. The Standing Offer will be for a one-year period. ### 3. Key Requirements * **UNSPSC Classification**: Infrastructure building and surfacing and paving services (72141100) * **Trade Agreements**: Widespread trade agreement coverage * **Regions**: Nova Scotia * **Areas of Delivery**: Halifax and surrounding areas ### 4. Invitation and Instructions All inquiries regarding the technical specifications or the contractual nature of the project must be submitted in writing to Jonathan Bullard, Contracting Authority, at least five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date. ### 5. Important Information Please note that the RISO will be for a one-year period. Contact Jonathan Bullard at jonathan.bullard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information. ### 1. Offre de services Le Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) invite les soumissionnaires qualifiés à soumettre une offre pour la fourniture de matériels, d'équipement, de main-d'œuvre et de transport nécessaires pour la réparation ou le remplacement de l'asphalte de la 14e
